commit.message:
libsyntax: Disallow keywords followed by `::`.

This breaks code that looked like:

    mymacro!(static::foo);

... where `mymacro!` expects a path or expression. Change such macros to
not accept keywords followed by `::`.

Closes #17298.

[breaking-change]

files.patch:

+fn main() {
+    struct::foo();  //~ ERROR expected identifier
+    mut::baz(); //~ ERROR expected identifier
+}
